    • getInstance

      public static com.estg.core.Institution getInstance​(java.lang.String name)
      Returns the instance of the Institution. If the instance does not already exist, it creates a new InstitutionImpl with the provided name.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the institution to create if it does not exist
      Returns:
      the existing or newly created instance of Institution

    • addAidBox

      public boolean addAidBox​(com.estg.core.AidBox aidbox) throws com.estg.core.exceptions.AidBoxException
      Adds a new Aid Box to the Institution
      Specified by:
      addAidBox in interface com.estg.core.Institution
      Parameters:
      aidbox - Aid Box
      Returns:
      true if the Aid Box was inserted in the collection storing all Aid Box and false if the Aid Box already exists
      Throws:
      com.estg.core.exceptions.AidBoxException - The Aid Box is null or The Aid Box is invalid, i.e. if the Aid Box have duplicate containers of a certain waste type

    • addMeasurement

      public boolean addMeasurement​(com.estg.core.Measurement msrmnt, com.estg.core.Container cntnr) throws com.estg.core.exceptions.ContainerException, com.estg.core.exceptions.MeasurementException
      Adds a new measurement to the Institution considering the Aid Box and container
      Specified by:
      addMeasurement in interface com.estg.core.Institution
      Parameters:
      msrmnt - Measurement considering the Aid Box and container
      cntnr - The Container for the measurement
      Returns:
      true if the measurement was inserted in the collection storing all measurements or false if the measurement already exists for a given date. (Each container has only one measurement for a given date)
      Throws:
      com.estg.core.exceptions.ContainerException - if the container doesn't exist
      com.estg.core.exceptions.MeasurementException - if the value is lesser than 0 and higher to the capacity

      Specified by:
      getContainer in interface com.estg.core.Institution
      Parameters:

      ct - item Type for getting measurements
      Returns:
      a copy of a existing containers
      Throws:
      com.estg.core.exceptions.ContainerException - if the Aid Box doesn't exist, or if a container with the given container type doesn't exist
